channel.title: Travel on TrozWare
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on TrozWare

item.title: Road Trip Apps
item.description: Over the past few months, we have done two long road trips: one approximately 4,000 km and the other about 1,800 km. These gave us the chance to try out various apps for navigation and travel information. We live in Queensland, Australia and some of these comments may be country-specific. Navigation The basic navigation came down to three apps: Apple Maps Google Maps Metroview (Australia and New Zealand only) Each has their strengths and weaknesses:
